attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A Petition to Disband the Labour party.

Please sign this petition if you are sick of listening to the lies of this government. This government who make all the hard working people of this country pay their ridiculous taxes for their truly crazy schemes of the loony left.

We are sick to death of labours lies and politics of envy.

The Labour party should be forced to disband before they damage our country any further
